name: Playback (Kyle Martin)
description:
CONTROLS

  • Move forward: D
  • Move backward: A
  • Jump: W
  • Start/Stop recording: L
  • Playback recording: P

GAME SOUNDTRACK

  • "Repeat, Repeat, Repeat..." by Srujan's Sound
  • https://open.spotify.com/track/4TXPas8Zlwzrhog0JnEM5n?si=mSuZOs7xTRmCnHccdoPGpw
